channel.title: Whats your favorite part of sex?

item.title: Whats your favorite part of sex?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:31, topic:22560”][quote author=pko link=topic=34434.msg422579#msg422579 date=1163013444]
No, I’m saying, dont try to act all romantic, pretty boy cutesy. Every guy would love to fuck a hot chick instead of taking her to dinner and having some fun. Also, you say I run around with my dick out? How? Just because I have had / and like sex? If you seriously, would rather go to dinner than have sex with your girlfriend, you need to break up with her and merry this guy named enrique victoria, number 867-5309.

[/quote]
You’re so wrong.

Just because you’re an insecure, heartless jerk dosn’t mean every guy is. Being Romantic is enjoyable, it gives both the people time to just talk and do the other things in a relationship that arn’t sex. I’d rather go out to dinner first, or even just dinner.

I’m a Virgin, not afraid to say it, and will be waiting for the perfect time.[/quote]

Doesn’t really mean that he is heartless, just that his testosterone is pumping pretty hard right now

At my age I’d rather sex. I’ve only been in two relationships but they demand too much. The first time it was as if she was too shy to talk, second time I felt like a piece property. Both were big headache giver’s and every girl is the same in my area. There was one more girl I was gonna ask out, but decided not to and I’d rather stay single and just have fun instead. I’m willing to date when girls start being more realistic.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats your favorite part of sex?
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

ilyaostr9:

I like the undressing part…

Error : 899 : This topic does not support gay sex.

[quote=“jme_009, post:14, topic:22560”][quote author=bullzeye link=topic=34434.msg411242#msg411242 date=1162800040]

Yeah except you’ve never had sex.
[/quote]Neither have you.

When people brag about sex, or go out attention-whoring themselves then they are lying. Back on kaitnieks, I remember a thread about whether you were a virgin or not. You could pick out who was telling the truth simply by how mature they were about it. If you can sit down and have a mature conversation about sex then you probably won’t have problems with liars. He’s just some pre-teen boy trying to impress some people on the internet; It’s a cry for help really.

So I suppose in a way no one know’s for sure if this guy has had sex or not, it’s probably safe to assume he has not. Especially after looking on his past posts, he’s obviously still very young.

I basically just wanted to say that before what I am about to say. Bullzeye, I am in NO way trying to look for attention for saying this, but I have had sex actually. When you get into the senior years of school, and start going to parties and drinking and smoking weed then you’ll end up having meaningless sex some night. Believe it or not, that is when I decided to quit these forums. I was over whelmed at all these new great things in life that I could easily obtain and I lost my interest of everything internet related. I guess it took me 3 months to understand where I really am, and somehow I regained interest in everything once again.[/quote]

You speak good truth. I’m sure many people come out with this… well bullshit yep.
I admit i’m a virgin =) Well kinda. But i’m fricken 14. I haven’t gone the FULL way yet.
And i’m sure half or more the people of the community haven’t, but they sit at home jacking of to a picture of whinnie the pooh.
Anyway The whole world doesn’t revolve around sex. I much enjoy foreplay. Well… anyway let’s not go into that.
But what i’m saying is Jme you talk sense =)

Read full topic

Yeah except you’ve never had sex.
[/quote]Neither have you.[/quote]
When people brag about sex, or go out attention-whoring themselves then they are lying. Back on kaitnieks, I remember a thread about whether you were a virgin or not. You could pick out who was telling the truth simply by how mature they were about it. If you can sit down and have a mature conversation about sex then you probably won’t have problems with liars. He’s just some pre-teen boy trying to impress some people on the internet; It’s a cry for help really.

So I suppose in a way no one know’s for sure if this guy has had sex or not, it’s probably safe to assume he has not. Especially after looking on his past posts, he’s obviously still very young.

I basically just wanted to say that before what I am about to say. Bullzeye, I am in NO way trying to look for attention for saying this, but I have had sex actually. When you get into the senior years of school, and start going to parties and drinking and smoking weed then you’ll end up having meaningless sex some night. Believe it or not, that is when I decided to quit these forums. I was over whelmed at all these new great things in life that I could easily obtain and I lost my interest of everything internet related. I guess it took me 3 months to understand where I really am, and somehow I regained interest in everything once again.
